Package transformation

Contains fundamental classes which deal with transformations between coordinate spaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TransformationMapping The interface for a transformation mapping - a function which maps a value from the domain interval to the range interval, and it's inverse function.
 

Class Summary
Interval A class representing an interval (or a range) of real numbers, above some lower bound and below some upper bound.
LinearTransformationMapping  
Transformation A class which facilitates transformations between a domain interval and a range interval via an implementation of a mapping.
Transformation2D A class which facilitates transformations between two rectangles in 2D space.
Window2D A class which translates between pixel-space and coordinate-space.
 

Package transformation Description

Contains fundamental classes which deal with transformations between coordinate spaces.
